It's been a while since our last update on happenings with `Rolla Skate Club's`_ `Short Track Roller Derby`_ rules, so we thought it was overdue another post. There are exciting things to write about, across the world, as well, so we'll break this up region by region!

North America

Later this month, Fort McMurray Roller Derby League, Alberta, will be taking their first steps into public Short Track events, with a triple-header https://www.facebook.com/events/437015853586543/
